name: East Coast Customs Handmade LIMITED RUN Paduk/Wenge/ Only25! FREE T-SHIRT-FREE SHIP
description:
We recently came across some AMAZING pieces of Paduk that have a unbelievable grain in them. We matched it up with a classic black stringer made of Wenge wood. The Paduk actually looks like its on fire! There was only so much of this, so we are making roughly 25 boards and that will be it. No more after they are gone. 

The boards are 7 ply Hard Maple, cold pressed, cured for 48 hours, and then hand shaped, sanded, drilled, and finished with 3 clear coats to protect your beauty. 

The bottoms are dyed black, with a black logo. STEALTH LOOK>>

They will come with Revenge Alpha II Trucks and huge Seismic 75mm 3 DM 78 A "ORANGE"Wheels with Abec 7 Bearings.

You want something different and the best of the best, then here she is!! 

We will sign and number each one.

This board can be used as just a straight up longboard, or grab one of our Land Paddles, and get a killer core workout. Dual purpose board! Plus comes with adjustable wheelbase so you can customize the flex to your weight and riding style. No wheel bite at all. We ran 97mm Wheels with no problem.

Get that killer Core workout!!

Sk8 Pole include. extends to over 6ft and retracts small enough for a back pack or throw in your trunk. Light weight aluminum. Rubber grommet pivot cup on the bottom.

name: 3DM 75MM AVILA WHEELS "CLEAR"SERIES
description:
Sold in sets of FOUR wheels.

Great for all-purpose longboarding and cruising, and among the world's best wheels for giant slalom, Super-G, banked slalom, bordercross, and downhill. Weighing more than 1/2-pound EACH, the Avilas bring new meaning to the terms "roll speed" and "inertia." Named after a favorite training ground for Central Coast racers, and the site of the 2002 World Slalom Championships, the Avilas dominate on long courses.

name: REVENGE TRUCKS - ALPHA II-175MM
description:
The Revenge Alpha II is a single pivot 45 Degree torsion truck made of 8DC12 recycle-based lead free aluminum. They are designed for carving, sidewalk surfing and for the pure thrill of turning. They are not intended to replace your conventional trucks fro the skate park. Revenge trucks are too performance oriented for traditional transition-based skateboarding.
The patented external locking mechanism allows for the tightest turns with no need for riser pads even with wheels up to 73mm, resulting in a full circle on a 47" board in less then 8ft, all with no wheel bite! Turning has never been easier!
They are mountable with standard hardware along with two options for hole patterns, old school and new school.
The bushings are made from the highest quality high impact polyurethane, made in the USA.

name: 3 DM 68mm Wheels
description:
Description: 68mm tall x 55mm wide Avalon Wheels. } Offset bearing seat, dual lip design. | 5.9 oz. each.

Sold in sets of FOUR wheels.

Great for all-purpose longboarding, cruising, and Old School styling, and one of the world's best all-around slalom wheels. Named after the legendary slalom racing site on Catalina Island, California, in the early and middle 2000s the Avalon won more elite races than all other brands combined. Please Select a Durometer.
